mapper.select: SELECT s.store_code, s.store_name, s.enable, s.store_type, s.store_id, c.name FROM st_store s LEFT JOIN city c ON s.city_code = c.code WHERE s.store_type!="ZS" ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT s.*, c.name FROM st_store s LEFT JOIN city c ON s.city_code = c.code where s.store_id=#{storeId}
SELECT s.store_id, s.store_name FROM st_store s LEFT JOIN city c on s.city_code = c.code WHERE c.city_id = #{cityId} AND s.store_type!="ZS"
SELECT s.store_id, s.store_name FROM st_store s LEFT JOIN city c on s.city_code = c.code WHERE c.city_id = #{cityId}
SELECT s.store_id, s.store_name FROM st_store s WHERE s.store_type!="ZS"
SELECT s.store_id, s.store_name FROM st_store s
SELECT s.store_code, s.store_name, s.enable, s.store_type, s.store_id, c.name FROM st_store s LEFT JOIN city c ON s.city_code = c.code WHERE c.city_id= #{cityId} AND s.store_type!="ZS"

SELECT s.store_code, s.store_name, s.enable, s.store_type, s.store_id, c.name FROM st_store s LEFT JOIN city c ON s.city_code = c.code WHERE s.store_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryStoreInfo},'%') OR s.store_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryStoreInfo},'%') AND s.store_type!="ZS"
SELECT s.store_code, s.store_name, s.enable, s.store_id, c.name, s.create_time FROM st_store s LEFT JOIN city c ON s.city_code = c.code WHERE s.store_type="ZS" ORDER BY s.create_time DESC
SELECT s.store_name, s.store_id as id FROM st_store s WHERE s.store_type="ZS" ORDER BY s.create_time DESC

SELECT s.store_code, s.store_name, s.enable, s.store_type, s.store_id, c.name FROM st_store s LEFT JOIN city c ON s.city_code = c.code WHERE s.store_type="ZS" AND (s.store_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryDecorativeInfo},'%') OR s.store_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryDecorativeInfo},'%')) ORDER BY s.create_time DESC
SELECT s.store_code, s.store_name, s.enable, s.store_type, s.store_id, s.create_time, c.name FROM st_store s LEFT JOIN city c ON s.city_code = c.code WHERE s.store_id=#{storeId} AND s.store_type="ZS"

SELECT s.store_code, s.store_name, s.enable, s.store_type, s.store_id, c.name, scm.credit_limit_available AS credit, ss.balance AS sponsorship FROM st_store s LEFT JOIN city c ON s.city_code = c.code LEFT JOIN st_credit_money scm on s.store_id=scm.store_id LEFT JOIN st_subvention ss on s.store_id=ss.store_id WHERE s.store_type="ZS" ORDER BY s.create_time DESC

SELECT s.store_code, s.store_name, s.enable, s.store_type, s.store_id, c.name, scm.id as cid, ss.id as sid, scm.credit_limit_available AS credit, ss.balance AS sponsorship FROM st_store s LEFT JOIN city c ON s.city_code = c.code LEFT JOIN st_credit_money scm on s.store_id=scm.store_id LEFT JOIN st_subvention ss on s.store_id=ss.store_id WHERE s.store_id =#{decorativeCompanyId} AND s.store_type="ZS"

SELECT s.store_code, s.store_name, s.enable, s.store_type, s.store_id, c.name, scm.credit_limit_available AS credit, ss.balance AS sponsorship FROM st_store s LEFT JOIN city c ON s.city_code = c.code LEFT JOIN st_credit_money scm on s.store_id=scm.store_id LEFT JOIN st_subvention ss on s.store_id=ss.store_id WHERE s.store_type="ZS" AND (s.store_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryDecorativeCreditInfo},'%') OR s.store_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryDecorativeCreditInfo},'%')) ORDER BY s.create_time DESC
SELECT s.store_id, s.store_name FROM st_store s LEFT JOIN city c on s.city_code = c.code WHERE c.city_id = #{cityId} AND s.store_type = 'ZS'
SELECT s.store_id, s.store_name FROM st_store s WHERE s.store_type = 'ZS'
SELECT s.store_id, s.store_name FROM st_store s LEFT JOIN city c on s.city_code = c.code WHERE c.city_id = #{cityId} AND s.is_self_delivery = TRUE
SELECT s.store_id, s.store_name FROM st_store s WHERE s.is_self_delivery = TRUE

SELECT sp.id, sp.balance, s.store_name, s.store_id, s.store_code, c.name city, s.store_type FROM st_store s LEFT JOIN st_pre_deposit sp on sp.store_id = s.store_id LEFT JOIN city c ON c.code = s.city_code WHERE s.store_id = #{storeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO st_pre_deposit (store_id, balance, last_update_time, create_time) VALUES (#{storeId}, #{balance}, #{lastUpdateTime}, #{createTime})
